title: Akamai Picks Up Hosting for Kernel.org
author: Frederic Lardinois
description: Akamai announced that it is picking up the hosting of kernel.org, the main distribution system for Linux kernel development.
cntitle: Akamai 接管 Kernel.org 的托管
cndescription: Akamai 宣布将接管 kernel.org 的托管，kernel.org 是 Linux 内核开发的主要分发系统。
